mensaje_principal.mensaje_principal-descripcion: I am a 3D Animator, 3D Artist, Illustrator, Front-End developer, and Edition Media based in Hidalgo, Mexico.

sobre_mi.sobre_mi-descripcion-1: I'm an engineer in Animation and Visual Effects with extensive experience in areas such as Front-End development, 3D modeling, 3D animation, design and multimedia editing. I am committed, responsible, and always strive to deliver high-quality results.
sobre_mi.sobre_mi-descripcion-2: I constantly seek new forms of expression through design and technology, staying up-to-date with the latest trends and creative tools. My passion lies in pushing the boundaries and exploring innovative ways to bring ideas to life.
sobre_mi.sobre_mi-descripcion-3: My experience ranges from working on the creation of 3D models and animations for an advertising campaign to generating 3D objects based on concept art. In my previous role as a 3D modeler at an animation studio, I had the opportunity to collaborate with artists, designers, and fellow modelers to develop the project.
sobre_mi.sobre_mi-descripcion-4: I'm excited to collaborate with you and create impactful visual experiences.

experience.experience_generalist-texto: I modeled, rigged and animated their mascot.
experience.experience_artist-text-1: I worked on some concept art for a videogame.
experience.experience_artist-text-2: I developed the 3D model of props (mid poly).

proyect.proyect-text: Challenge Oracle + Alura Latam for coding texts

animation-proyect.animation-proyect-text-lip: Experience a captivating lip sync and body mechanics' animation, meticulously crafted to bring every frame to life.
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-lip-link1: Modeled by  Mia Pray [Modeling - Texturing], Rijah Kazuo [rigging] & Sagar Arun [Animation - Rig Testing]
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-text-attacks: Here you can see a serie of attacks of the charater Heizou from Genshin Impact.
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-text-mistery: Animation of a woman, a cowboy and a dog searching on the woods for a mistery.
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-mistery-link1: Models and scenario are not mine
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-mistery-link2: Audio from live action movie Scooby Doo: Spooky Island.
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-text-jd: Spider-Gwen dancing on a scenario a trend from Tik Tok.
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-jd-link1: None of the props are mine
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-jd-link3: It was animated on Autodesk Maya and rendered on Marmoset Toolbag.
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-text-wa: Lip sync and body mechanics' animation shown on an acting scene.
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-wa-link2: Music and boy's voice from E.T. movie (Across the moon)
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-wa-link3: Woman's voice from Legacies by Danielle Rose Russell
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-text-dog: Scene of a dog following a ball and then talking to itself, or rather said, its reflection.
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-dog-link1: Dog's model by Truong CG Artist
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-dog-link2: The audio was taken from Scooby Doo Mystery Incorporated
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-dog-link3: The room's model was made by me
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-text-rude: Bony dancing Rude Boy following a choreography from the game Dance Central 2.
animation-proyect.animation-proyect-rude-link3: Choreography by Marcos Aguirre / Frenchy Hernandez
